# init(healthStore:workoutConfiguration:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new data source based on the provided workout configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
init(healthStore: HKHealthStore, workoutConfiguration configuration: HKWorkoutConfiguration?)
```

## Creating a live data source

- **typesToCollect**: The quantity type samples that the data source automatically sends to the workout builder.

items.description: The quantity type samples that the data source automatically sends to the workout builder.
